result.execSummary:
The defendant Erwin Jay Pruitt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: All records scanned

records.addlTxt: Granted probation
Defendant plans on seeking postconviction relief.

Defendant Erwin Jay Pruitt in court with attorney Wendy S. Paul.  Gerad T Dougvillo appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Erwin Jay Pruitt in court with attorney Wendy S. Paul.  Defendant Erwin Jay Pruitt in custody.  Gerad T Dougvillo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
Parties have reviewed PSI. No additions or corrections noted by parties. The State indicates PSI calls for straight jail sentence in 1413 and I/S prison on 1748. 

BTC: 14CF1413 - 6 mos RCJ/CFTS. 
         14CF1748-Total sentence is 5 1/2 yrs WPS bifurcated as 3 yrs IC, 2 1/2 yrs ES - STAYED. 2 yrs probation.

Conditions:
obey all rules and regs
costs
DNA costs
no alc/cs except by Rx-UA's
Any counseling deemed approp by agent; specifically AODA assessment, treatment and after care
FT emp
be compliant with any child support orders

FAW/vote

IS eligible for CIP and SAP

Ct 1: 946.49(1)(b)-Felony BJ. It is a condition of this bond that the defendant  NOT consume or possess any alcohol or controlled substances.   Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) to monitor - report to 524 S Main Street, Third Floor (262-632-1780).   Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Erwin Jay Pruitt in court with attorney Wendy S. Paul.  Defendant Erwin Jay Pruitt in custody.  Gerad T Dougvillo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
Upon plea to Ct 2 in 14CF1748, Bal is DRI. Pl to 14CF1413 w/o repeater, State moves to DRI 14CF586. State recommends I/s prison-amount determined by the Court. 2 yrs probation, absolute sobriety, conditional jail time-amount determined by the Court.
P-NC to both
COP filed, rights given
the deft waives right to JT
the State relies on comp for FB - defense stipulates to same
finding of guilt

Defense is asking for bond to be modified to $500.00. The State objects to any modification of bond citing defendant's track record on bond.

BTC: guilty as above. PSI ordered. Bond modificaton is granted in 14CF1413 - $1,000.00 cash. 14CF1748-$1000.00 cash. Previous conditons of both bonds remain  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 19, 2015 at 10:30 am.
